verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

After the doings<WH4639> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> wherein<WH834> ye dwelt,<WH3427> shall ye not<WH3808> do:<WH6213> and after the doings<WH4639> of the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> whither<WH834> <WH8033> I<WH589> bring<WH935> you, shall ye not<WH3808> do:<WH6213> neither<WH3808> shall ye walk<WH1980> in their ordinances.<WH2708>
Ye shall do<WH6213> <WH853> my judgments,<WH4941> and keep<WH8104> mine ordinances,<WH2708> to walk<WH1980> therein: I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Ye shall therefore keep<WH8104> <WH853> my statutes,<WH2708> and my judgments:<WH4941> which<WH834> if a man<WH120> do,<WH6213> he shall live<WH2425> in them: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
None <WH3808> <WH376> <WH376> of you shall approach<WH7126> to<WH413> any<WH3605> that is near<WH7607> of kin<WH1320> to him, to uncover<WH1540> their nakedness:<WH6172> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy father,<WH1> or the nakedness<WH6172> of thy mother,<WH517> shalt thou not<WH3808> uncover:<WH1540> she<WH1931> is thy mother;<WH517> thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> her nakedness.<WH6172>
The nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> wife<WH802> shalt thou not<WH3808> uncover:<WH1540> it<WH1931> is thy father's<WH1> nakedness.<WH6172>

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy sister,<WH269> the daughter<WH1323> of thy father,<WH1> or<WH176> daughter<WH1323> of thy mother,<WH517> whether she be born<WH4138> at home,<WH1004> or<WH176> born<WH4138> abroad,<WH2351> even their nakedness<WH6172> thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover.<WH1540>

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy son's<WH1121> daughter,<WH1323> or<WH176> of thy daughter's<WH1323> daughter,<WH1323> even their nakedness<WH6172> thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover:<WH1540> for<WH3588> theirs<WH2007> is thine own nakedness.<WH6172>

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> wife's<WH802> daughter,<WH1323> begotten<WH4138> of thy father,<WH1> she<WH1931> is thy sister,<WH269> thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> her nakedness.<WH6172>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> sister:<WH269> she<WH1931> is thy father's<WH1> near kinswoman.<WH7607>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy mother's<WH517> sister:<WH269> for<WH3588> she<WH1931> is thy mother's<WH517> near kinswoman.<WH7607>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> brother,<WH251> thou shalt not<WH3808> approach<WH7126> to<WH413> his wife:<WH802> she<WH1931> is thine aunt.<WH1733>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy daughter-in-law:<WH3618> she<WH1931> is thy son's<WH1121> wife;<WH802> thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> her nakedness.<WH6172>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy brother's<WH251> wife:<WH802> it<WH1931> is thy brother's<WH251> nakedness.<WH6172>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of a woman<WH802> and her daughter,<WH1323> neither<WH3808> shalt thou take<WH3947> <WH853> her son's<WH1121> daughter,<WH1323> or her daughter's<WH1323> daughter,<WH1323> to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness;<WH6172> for they<WH2007> are her near kinswomen:<WH7608> it<WH1931> is wickedness.<WH2154>
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou take<WH3947> a wife<WH802> to<WH413> her sister,<WH269> to vex<WH6887> her, to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness,<WH6172> beside<WH5921> the other in her life<WH2416> time.
Also thou shalt not<WH3808> approach<WH7126> unto<WH413> a woman<WH802> to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness,<WH6172> as long as she is put apart<WH5079> for her uncleanness.<WH2932>
Moreover thou shalt not<WH3808> lie carnally<WH5414> <WH7903> <WH2233> with<WH413> thy neighbor's<WH5997> wife,<WH802> to defile<WH2930> thyself with her.

And thou shalt not<WH3808> let<WH5414> any of thy seed<WH4480> <WH2233> pass through<WH5674> the fire to Molech,<WH4432> neither<WH3808> shalt thou profane<WH2490> <WH853> the name<WH8034> of thy God:<WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> lie<WH7901> with<WH854> mankind,<WH2145> as with<WH4904> womankind:<WH802> it<WH1931> is abomination.<WH8441>

Neither <WH3808> shalt thou lie<WH5414> <WH7903> with any<WH3605> beast<WH929> to defile<WH2930> thyself therewith: neither<WH3808> shall any woman<WH802> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> a beast<WH929> to lie down<WH7250> thereto: it<WH1931> is confusion.<WH8397>

Defile not ye yourselves<WH2930> <WH408> in any<WH3605> of these things:<WH428> for<WH3588> in all<WH3605> these<WH428> the nations<WH1471> are defiled<WH2930> which<WH834> I<WH589> cast out<WH7971> before<WH4480> <WH6440> you:
And the land<WH776> is defiled:<WH2930> therefore I do visit<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> thereof upon<WH5921> it, and the land<WH776> itself vomiteth out<WH6958> <WH853> her inhabitants.<WH3427>

Ye <WH859> shall therefore keep<WH8104> <WH853> my statutes<WH2708> and my judgments,<WH4941> and shall not<WH3808> commit<WH6213> any of these<WH4480> <WH3605> <WH428> abominations;<WH8441> neither any of your own nation,<WH249> nor any stranger<WH1616> that sojourneth<WH1481> among<WH8432> you:
(For <WH3588> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH411> abominations<WH8441> have the men<WH376> of the land<WH776> done,<WH6213> which<WH834> were before<WH6440> you, and the land<WH776> is defiled;)<WH2930>
That the land<WH776> spew not you out<WH6958> <WH3808> <WH853> also, when ye defile<WH2930> it, as<WH834> it spewed out<WH6958> <WH853> the nations<WH1471> that<WH834> were before<WH6440> you.

For <WH3588> whosoever<WH3605> <WH834> shall commit<WH6213> any<WH4480> <WH3605> of these<WH428> abominations,<WH8441> even the souls<WH5315> that commit<WH6213> them shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH4480> <WH7130> their people.<WH5971>

Therefore shall ye keep<WH8104> <WH853> mine ordinance,<WH4931> that ye commit not<WH6213> <WH1115> any one of these abominable customs,<WH4480> <WH2708> <WH8441> which<WH834> were committed<WH6213> before<WH6440> you, and that ye defile not yourselves<WH2930> <WH3808> therein: I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
